document_data.name: Sschindylryn's Gate
document_data.mainbody: '''Sschindylryn's Gate''' was a ''[[portal]]'' on an island in the [[Darklake]] in the [[Northdark]].
document_data.History: The ''portal'' was discovered by scouts from the city of [[Sschindylryn]], a [[drow]] city under [[Cormyr]] known for its use of portals to explore and conquer other parts of the Underdark. During a battle with [[Menzoberranzan]], the portal was damaged and none from the western city knew how to operate it or to where it led.<ref>
